languages.text: {n}Наместник чуть стискивает зубы прежде, чем ответить.{/n} "Я всеми силами оттягиваю момент, когда на станции начнется голод. До анверов не дошли руки. При всей своей вредности, они — не игроки. Когда их заводила сдохнет, остальные сами разбегутся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наместник чуть стискивает зубы прежде, чем ответить.{/n} "Я всеми силами оттягиваю момент, когда на станции начнется голод. До анверов не дошли руки. При всей своей вредности, они — не игроки. Их предводитель — скорее просто заводила, чем главарь с планом и амбициями. Он не командует, а только провоцирует на резню и грабежи. Когда эта пустотная крыса сдохнет, остальные сами разбегутся".

languages.text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."
languages.original_text: {n}Наместник чуть стискивает зубы прежде, чем ответить.{/n} "Я всеми силами оттягиваю момент, когда на станции начнется голод. До анверов не дошли руки. При всей своей вредности, они — не игроки. Когда их заводила сдохнет, остальные сами разбегутся".

traits.locale_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. Their leader is more of an instigator than a gang boss with a plan and ambitions. They don't issue orders, merely incite slaughter and robberies. When that void rat dies, the rest will scatter themselves."

{n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. Their leader is more of an instigator than a gang boss with a plan and ambitions. They don't issue orders, merely incite slaughter and robberies. When that void rat dies, the rest will scatter themselves."

{n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. Their leader is more of a troublemaker than a gang leader with a plan and ambitions. They don't issue orders, they merely incite slaughter and robberies. When that void rat dies, the rest will scatter."

{n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. Their leader is more of a troublemaker than a gang leader with a plan and ambitions. They don't issue orders, they merely incite slaughter and robberies. When that void rat dies, the rest will scatter."

{n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

languages.text: {n}他微微咬紧牙关，回答道。{/n}“我手上所有的资源，都用来推迟落脚港的饥荒爆发了。目前，我暂时腾不出手处理安维尔帮。虽然他们颇具危害，但他们毕竟不是什么大人物。只要首领一死，剩下的人就作鸟兽散了。”
languages.original_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

traits.locale_text: {n}他微微咬紧牙关，回答道。{/n}“我手上所有的资源，都用来推迟落脚港的饥荒爆发了。目前，我暂时腾不出手处理安维尔帮。虽然他们颇具危害，但他们毕竟不是什么大人物。只要首领一死，剩下的人就作鸟兽散了。”

languages.text: {n}Aprieta ligeramente los dientes antes de contestar.{/n} «He movido mar y tierra para contener la llegada de la hambruna a la estación. Aún no he podido ocuparme de los Anvers. Por muy peligrosos que sean, no son realmente un problema. Cuando su líder muera, los demás se disolverán».
languages.original_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aprieta ligeramente los dientes antes de contestar.{/n} «He movido mar y tierra para contener la llegada de la hambruna a la estación. Aún no he podido ocuparme de los Anvers. Por muy peligrosos que sean, no son realmente un problema. Cuando su líder muera, los demás se disolverán».

languages.text: {n}Il grince légèrement des dents avant de vous répondre :{/n} « Toutes mes ressources sont actuellement consacrées à la poursuite d'un but : retarder le moment où la station sera frappée par la famine. Je n'ai pas encore eu l'occasion de me pencher sur les Anver. Aussi néfastes soient-ils, ils n'ont pas grande importance. Lorsque leur chef sera mort, le reste s'éparpillera sans demander son reste. »
languages.original_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il grince légèrement des dents avant de vous répondre :{/n} « Toutes mes ressources sont actuellement consacrées à la poursuite d'un but : retarder le moment où la station sera frappée par la famine. Je n'ai pas encore eu l'occasion de me pencher sur les Anver. Aussi néfastes soient-ils, ils n'ont pas grande importance. Lorsque leur chef sera mort, le reste s'éparpillera sans demander son reste. »

languages.text: {n}Er beißt leicht die Zähne zusammen, bevor er antwortet.{/n} "Ich habe sämtliche Ressourcen darauf verwendet, den Moment zu verzögern, wenn die Station von einer Hungersnot erfasst wird. Zu den Anvers bin ich einfach noch nicht gekommen. Sie sind zwar sehr lästig, aber nicht relevant. Stirbt Ihr Anführer, werden sie sich zerstreuen."
languages.original_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er beißt leicht die Zähne zusammen, bevor er antwortet.{/n} "Ich habe sämtliche Ressourcen darauf verwendet, den Moment zu verzögern, wenn die Station von einer Hungersnot erfasst wird. Zu den Anvers bin ich einfach noch nicht gekommen. Sie sind zwar sehr lästig, aber nicht relevant. Stirbt Ihr Anführer, werden sie sich zerstreuen."

languages.text: {n}男は、ギュッと歯を食いしばって言葉を紡いだ。{/n}「私はいかなる手段も使って、ステーションが飢餓に見舞われるその時を先延ばしにしようと努めてきた。未だアンヴァースに対処する余裕などない。奴らは悩みの種ではあるが、重要ではない。リーダーが死ねば、残りは散り散りになる」
languages.original_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は、ギュッと歯を食いしばって言葉を紡いだ。{/n}「私はいかなる手段も使って、ステーションが飢餓に見舞われるその時を先延ばしにしようと努めてきた。未だアンヴァースに対処する余裕などない。奴らは悩みの種ではあるが、重要ではない。リーダーが死ねば、残りは散り散りになる」

languages.text: {n}Cevap vermeden önce dişlerini hafifçe sıkıyor.{/n} "Tüm kaynaklarımı istasyonun kıtlığa yenik düşmesini geciktirmek için kullanıyorum. Henüz Anverlar ile ilgilenme fırsatım olmadı. Lakin her ne kadar zararlı olsalar da ehemmiyetli değiller. Başlarındaki ölürse çete de dağılır."
languages.original_text: {n}He grits his teeth slightly before answering.{/n} "I've been using all my resources to delay the moment when the station is hit by famine. I haven't gotten around to the Anvers yet. As detrimental as they are, they're no players. When their leader dies, the rest will scatter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dişlerini, cevap vermeden önce hafifçe gıcırdatıyor.{/n} "İstasyonun kıtlığa yenik düşmesini geciktirmek için tüm kaynaklarımı kullanıyorum. Henüz Anverlar ile ilgilenemedim. Lakin her ne kadar zararlı olsalar da ehemmiyetli değiller. Liderleri ölürse kalanlar da dağılır."
